items.title: ‘No Kings’ rallies draw big crowds to protest Trump and his policies
items.description: Across the country, relatively few disruptions were reported during protests and marches where the mood ranged from joyful to defiant.

items.title: Trump watches the military parade of his dreams march through D.C.
items.description: The parade came amid one of the most tumultuous weeks of Trump’s presidency, with troops in L.A., missiles launched in the Middle East and a targeted ...

items.title: Minn. lawmaker, husband killed in shooting, setting off search for gunman
items.description: Another state legislator and his wife were also shot in the predawn hours in brazen attacks that officials called “politically motivated.”

items.title: Trump reports over $600 million in income in latest financial disclosure
items.description: what the latest financial disclosures show about how much money Trump & other officials made from crypto, Bible, speeches and other items

items.title: Republicans ignore their own age issues in pursuit of Biden’s frailty
items.description: Just as old as Democrats in Washington, GOP lawmakers argue age is not an issue for their party’s future.
